author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SecureWorks Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Loss Per Share $0.12
text:
March 28 (Reuters) - SecureWorks Corp:
* SECUREWORKS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR FISCAL 2018 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.12
* Q4 REVENUE $120.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $117.7 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.08 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2019 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.16 TO $0.20
* SEES Q1 2019 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.06 TO $0.07
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.12 INCLUDING ITEMS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.06, REVENUE VIEW $121.2 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.16, REVENUE VIEW $504.6 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2019 CAPEX TO BE IN RANGE OF $16 MILLION TO $17 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
